column4: im running ubuntu 8.04 and was just wondering how do you rotate the 3d cube?
i have wobbly windows
i used to run beryl all the time but i dont see how to rotate cube
ctrl-alt-arrow
or ctrl-alt-mouse and spin it manually
ok need to check
cntrl-alt mouse dont work
i have the other effects though
then turn on cube
i set to 4 desktops in case the default 2 wasnt enough
i downloaded compiz settings manager and did set 3d cube on
already
digital_, might be onto something
can you ctrl-alt-arrow to spin the cube?
no i dont see a cuve
i can do alot of other effects though
cntrl-alt-arrow is a slide
switches between 4 desktops
turn off desktop wall then
you can't have wall and cube together
ok going to check
you also need rotate cube turned on
